name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a focused Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of advanced experience, I excel in **Backend Engineering**, specializing in developing high-performance backend solutions that enhance system scalability and support growth strategy in the FinTech sector. My strong background includes modern technologies such as **Python**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, which I have leveraged to create robust, secure applications. 
I have successfully managed high-impact projects, leading cross-functional teams in remote environments to deliver enterprise-grade platforms that comply with regulatory standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. My expertise extends to integrating machine learning capabilities, where I have built and deployed data processing pipelines using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Additionally, I have a proven track record in implementing CI/CD in cloud environments with **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring efficient and scalable production deployments.
